What If_

The world's fastest man went even faster?

Director of Excitement

Usain Bolt is our new Director of Excitement. The fastest, most exciting man on the planet captures the essence of the most thrilling car on the road—the Nissan GT-R. Speed. Performance. Attitude. Reputation. That’s what Bolt has. And so does the GT-R. Because a supercar deserves a superhuman.
